properties.name: manon.default-user.admin.username
properties.description: An admin user is created in database with this username if no admin found in database during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.admin.password
properties.description: An admin user is created in database with this password if no admin found in database during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.actuator.username
properties.description: An actuator-client user is created in database with this username if no actuator-client found in database during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.actuator.password
properties.description: An actuator-client user is created in database with this password if no actuator-client found in database during start-up.

properties.name: manon.batch.user-snapshot.chunk
properties.description: User snapshot batch: user chunk size.

properties.name: manon.batch.user-snapshot.snapshot.max-age
properties.description: User snapshot batch: user snapshot max age in days.
